issues.problem: Desktop navigation menu displays instead of hamburger menu
issues.detail: Full desktop nav bar (O nas, Sluzby, Metody, Cenik, Vysledky, Kontakt, phone) shown at 320px width, overflowing far beyond viewport
issues.impact: Navigation is completely unusable on small mobile devices

issues.problem: Hero text and content overflow / cut off on left side
issues.detail: H1 title 'Transplantace vlasu s ceskou podporou' is clipped on the left edge. Stats (5000+, 95%) also clipped. CTA buttons partially hidden.
issues.impact: Core messaging and call-to-action invisible to mobile users

issues.problem: Page content only occupies left portion of screen, large white gap on right
issues.detail: Content is pushed to the left side with massive empty white space on the right half of the viewport
issues.impact: Very poor visual presentation, looks broken

issues.problem: Same desktop navigation overflow as Mobile S
issues.detail: Desktop nav bar still shows at 375px, not switching to mobile hamburger menu

issues.problem: Hero content still cut off on left, white gap on right
issues.detail: Same layout issue as 320px - content shifted left, right side empty

issues.problem: Desktop navigation still showing full menu at tablet size
issues.detail: At 768px the full desktop nav bar displays. While it fits better than mobile, it should ideally use a hamburger or simplified menu at this breakpoint
issues.impact: Navigation items are small and cramped

results.notes: Layout works well at this width. Navigation fits. Content properly sized.
Full desktop layout displays correctly. Navigation bar visible with all items. Hero, services, pricing, testimonials, FAQ, contact form, and footer all render properly.

findings: PASS: Cohesive dark theme (dark gray/black background) with gold/yellow accents
PASS: Green WhatsApp CTA button provides strong contrast
PASS: White text on dark hero section has good contrast
PASS: Light sections (white background) with dark text is readable
NOTE: Gold/yellow accent color (#D4A843 approx) used consistently for badges and highlights
PASS: Clear heading hierarchy H1 > H2 > H3 > H4
PASS: H1 is large and prominent on hero
PASS: Body text is readable size
PASS: Font pairing is clean and modern
NOTE: H3 and H4 in benefits section could have more size differentiation
PASS: Good whitespace between sections
PASS: Service cards have adequate breathing room
PASS: Benefits grid (01-06) well-spaced with consistent gaps
PASS: Pricing cards have clear separation
NOTE: Some sections feel quite tall with excessive vertical padding on desktop
PASS: Hero section has clear visual hierarchy - badge > H1 > subtitle > CTAs > stats
PASS: Services section with cards draws attention to offerings
PASS: Pricing comparison (Bez letenky vs S letenkou) is well-structured
WARN: 'Nezavazna poptavka' CTA buttons in pricing could be more visually distinct - the outlined version doesn't stand out enough
PASS: FAQ accordion is clean and scannable
PASS: Skip links present ('Preskocit na hlavni obsah', 'Preskocit na zapati')
PASS: Form fields have required states marked
PASS: Heading levels used properly (H1 > H2 > H3 > H4)
WARN: No visible hamburger/mobile menu - mobile users cannot navigate
WARN: Checkbox for GDPR consent appears readonly - may confuse users
NOTE: All interactive elements (buttons, links) are present in accessibility tree

firstTimeVisitor.notes: Value proposition is immediately clear on desktop: hair transplant clinic with Czech support, premium service, transparent pricing. Trust signals present (5000+ clients, 95% success, 15+ years). Clear CTAs.

averageUser.notes: Desktop experience is good. Navigation is logical (O nas, Sluzby, Metody, Cenik, Vysledky, Kontakt). Contact options are prominently displayed (WhatsApp, phone, email). Pricing is transparent with two clear options.

mobileOnly.notes: CRITICAL: Mobile experience is essentially broken. No hamburger menu means users cannot navigate. Content is cut off. Hero text is illegible. This persona would immediately leave the site.

techSavvy.notes: Clean, modern design on desktop. No unnecessary steps. Multiple contact options. Skip links for keyboard navigation. FAQ section is scannable.

accessibilityUser.notes: Good accessibility tree structure. Skip links present. Headings properly nested. Form labels present. However, mobile navigation failure means keyboard/screen-reader users on mobile cannot navigate.

findings: PASS: Purpose clear within 5 seconds - hair transplant clinic
PASS: Value proposition prominent - Czech support, 5* hotel, VIP transfer
PASS: Trust signals visible - 5000+ clients, 95% success rate, 15+ years
PASS: Professional dark design with gold accents conveys premium service
PASS: Primary CTA (WhatsApp) is green and eye-catching
PASS: Desktop nav has logical categories
PASS: Footer has organized links (Sluzby, Informace, Kontakt)
PASS: Phone number always visible in nav bar
FAIL: No hamburger menu on mobile/tablet - navigation completely broken below ~1024px
FAIL: Navigation bar does not collapse or adapt at any breakpoint
NOTE: Dropdown arrows on 'O nas', 'Sluzby', 'Metody' suggest submenus exist
PASS: Primary CTA 'Napsat na WhatsApp' is green, prominent, and above the fold
PASS: Secondary CTA 'Zobrazit cenik' with outline style provides clear alternative
PASS: 'Nezavazna poptavka' buttons in pricing section
PASS: Contact section offers 3 channels (WhatsApp, phone, email) with response times
PASS: CTA buttons have adequate size for desktop touch targets
PASS: Contact form has 4 fields - name, email, phone (required), message (optional)
PASS: Required fields marked with asterisk
PASS: GDPR consent checkbox present with link to privacy policy
PASS: Submit button clearly labeled 'Odeslat poptavku'
WARN: Checkbox shows readonly state - needs verification that it works
NOTE: No visible inline validation indicators
PASS: Content is scannable with clear section headings
PASS: Services broken into 3 clear cards (Muzi, Zeny, Vousy)
PASS: Benefits presented in numbered grid (01-06)
PASS: Pricing simplified to just 2 options
PASS: FAQ addresses common concerns in expandable format
NOTE: Page is long but well-sectioned with visual breaks

findings.issue: No mobile/tablet responsive navigation - hamburger menu missing
findings.recommendation: Add responsive hamburger menu that activates below 1024px breakpoint
findings.userImpact: Mobile users (50%+ of traffic) cannot navigate the site at all

findings.issue: Content shifts left and gets clipped on mobile viewports
findings.recommendation: Fix CSS responsive layout - content should be centered and contained within viewport at all sizes
findings.userImpact: Hero messaging, CTAs, and stats invisible on mobile

findings.issue: GDPR checkbox appears as readonly in accessibility tree
findings.recommendation: Verify checkbox is actually interactive. Remove readonly attribute if present.
findings.userImpact: Users may not be able to submit the form if checkbox doesn't work

findings.issue: Pricing CTA 'Nezavazna poptavka' (outlined style on left card) is less prominent than ideal
findings.recommendation: Consider making both pricing CTAs filled/solid style, or add hover effects
findings.userImpact: Users might overlook the lower-price option CTA

strengths: Professional, premium dark design with gold accents matching hair transplant clinic branding
Clear value proposition visible immediately on desktop
Strong trust signals (5000+ clients, 95% success, 15+ years experience)
Transparent pricing with two clear options (69,900 Kc / 75,500 Kc)
Multiple contact channels (WhatsApp, phone, email) with response time promises
Well-structured content flow: Hero > Services > Benefits > Pricing > Testimonials > FAQ > Contact
Clean FAQ accordion with 6 relevant questions
3 client testimonials with names and procedure details
Good accessibility tree with skip links and proper heading hierarchy
Footer well-organized with 3 columns (Sluzby, Informace, Kontakt) + legal links

criticalFixes.issue: Mobile navigation completely broken - no hamburger menu
criticalFixes.description: The header navigation does not switch to a mobile hamburger menu at any breakpoint. At 320-768px, the full desktop menu bar overflows, making navigation impossible for mobile users.
criticalFixes.suggestedFix: Add CSS media query to hide desktop nav and show hamburger toggle below 1024px. Implement mobile drawer/overlay menu.

criticalFixes.issue: Content layout broken on mobile - shifted left, clipped, white gap on right
criticalFixes.description: On mobile viewports (320-425px), the page content is shifted to the left with text and elements being clipped. A large white gap appears on the right side of the viewport.
criticalFixes.suggestedFix: Check for fixed-width elements or overflow issues in the hero section and main content wrapper. Ensure max-width: 100% and overflow-x: hidden on body/main containers.
criticalFixes.impact: CRITICAL - core content invisible on mobile

improvements.description: Verify GDPR checkbox is interactive (currently shows readonly state)
Add form validation feedback (inline error messages)
improvements.impact: Better user experience during form submission

improvements.description: Make both pricing CTA buttons equally prominent
Increase H3/H4 size differentiation in benefits section
Consider reducing excessive vertical padding between sections on desktop
